ResourceHeader.ResourceName: FMT H-alpha movies of representative solar prominence eruptions and flares
ResourceHeader.Description: Solar full-disk chromospheric movies of representative solar prominence and filament eruptions and flares obtained around H-alpha absorption line with the FMT telescope at Hida Observatory.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Kwasan and Hida Observatories, Kyoto University

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: If you want to study raw FMT image data, you can download them from "all digital raw images download site". When you use the FMT data for your paper etc., it would be appreciated that you will inform us about the title etc.

DisplayData.Keyword: Sun, Chromosphere, Halpha, Flare, Filament, Prominence, eruption, Moreton wave
